languages.text:
"Тебя не оскорблю отказом я,
И песнь твоей души уберегу.
Оставь мне явь — я грезы отдаю
Тебе на попеченье, зрящий вдаль".
{n}Арлекин исполненным почтения ударом прекращает муки сородича и бережно снимает с его тела камень души. Когда ксенос поворачивается к вам, его руки уже пусты — камень пропал.{/n}

traits.locale_text:
"Тебя не оскорблю отказом я,
И песнь твоей души уберегу.
Оставь мне явь — я грезы отдаю
Тебе на попеченье, зрящий вдаль".
{n}Арлекин исполненным почтения ударом прекращает муки сородича и бережно снимает с его тела камень души. Когда ксенос поворачивается к вам, его руки уже пусты — камень пропал.{/n}
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
"Disdain you not will I with a refusal,
Your soul's refrain will I keep safe as well,
But leave to me reality, Farseer,
And dreams I'll give into your worthy hands."
{n}With a solemn strike, the Harlequin ends his kinsman's torment and carefully takes the spirit stone from his body. When the xenos turns to you, his hands are already empty — the stone is gone.{/n}
languages.original_text:
"Тебя не оскорблю отказом я,

traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
“我不会心怀鄙夷，拒绝你的请求，
我会尽我所能，将你的灵魂保留。
不过，让我归于现实吧，先知。
归于你的梦境，交予你的双手。”
{n}随着庄重的一击，丑角结束了他的亲族的痛苦。他小心翼翼地从先知的身体中取出了灵魂石。当丑角转向你时，他的手上已经空空如也，那块石头不见了。{/n}
languages.original_text:
"Disdain you not will I with a refusal,
Your soul's refrain will I keep safe as well,
But leave to me reality, Farseer,
And dreams I'll give into your worthy hands."
{n}With a solemn strike, the Harlequin ends his kinsman's torment and carefully takes the spirit stone from his body. When the xenos turns to you, his hands are already empty — the stone is gone.{/n}

{n}随着庄重的一击，丑角结束了他的亲族的痛苦。他小心翼翼地从先知的身体中取出了灵魂石。当丑角转向你时，他的手上已经空空如也，那块石头不见了。{/n}
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
«No te deshonraré ignorando el presente:
el legado de tu alma protegeré también,
pero déjame a mí la realidad, vidente,
y los sueños a tus dignas manos confiaré».
{n}De un impacto solemne, el Arlequín pone fin al tormento de su hermano y coge con respeto su joya espiritual. Cuando el xenos se gira hacia ti, sus manos ya están vacías; no hay ni rastro de la joya.{/n}
languages.original_text:
"Disdain you not will I with a refusal,
Your soul's refrain will I keep safe as well,
But leave to me reality, Farseer,
And dreams I'll give into your worthy hands."
{n}With a solemn strike, the Harlequin ends his kinsman's torment and carefully takes the spirit stone from his body. When the xenos turns to you, his hands are already empty — the stone is gone.{/n}

languages.text:
「拒むことなく受け入れよう
その魂の旋律もまた、僕が守ろう
されど現実は僕に委ねろ、先見司よ
さすればその立派な手に夢を託そう」
{n}強烈な一撃でハーレクィンは同胞を苦しみから解放し、慎重に彼の身体から魂縛石を取り出した。異種族がこちらへ振り向いたとき、彼の手はすでに空だった。石は消えていた。{/n}
languages.original_text:
"Disdain you not will I with a refusal,
Your soul's refrain will I keep safe as well,
But leave to me reality, Farseer,
And dreams I'll give into your worthy hands."
{n}With a solemn strike, the Harlequin ends his kinsman's torment and carefully takes the spirit stone from his body. When the xenos turns to you, his hands are already empty — the stone is gone.{/n}

traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
"Zeig nicht Verachtung Euch durch Weigerung,
beschütze sogar Eurer Seele Lied.
Doch überlasst die Wirklichkeit nur mir,
und Träume geb ich Euch, o Seherin."
{n}Mit einem feierlichen Hieb beendet der Harlekin das Leid seines Verwandten und entnimmt seinem Körper vorsichtig den Seelenstein. Als der Xenos sich zu dir umwendet, sind seine Hände bereits leer — der Stein ist fort.{/n}
languages.original_text:
"Disdain you not will I with a refusal,

But leave to me reality, Farseer,
And dreams I'll give into your worthy hands."
{n}With a solemn strike, the Harlequin ends his kinsman's torment and carefully takes the spirit stone from his body. When the xenos turns to you, his hands are already empty — the stone is gone.{/n}

languages.text:
« Je ne vous ferai pas l'affront de refuser,
Et je protégerai le refrain de votre âme sans trêve,
Mais, Grand Prophète, laissez-moi la réalité,
Et entre vos mains expertes, je laisserai les rêves. »
{n}D'un coup solennel, l'Arlequin met un terme à la souffrance de l'Aeldari et s'empare délicatement de sa pierre-esprit. Lorsqu'il se tourne vers vous, ses mains sont déjà vides : la pierre a disparu.{/n}
languages.original_text:
"Disdain you not will I with a refusal,
Your soul's refrain will I keep safe as well,
But leave to me reality, Farseer,
And dreams I'll give into your worthy hands."
{n}With a solemn strike, the Harlequin ends his kinsman's torment and carefully takes the spirit stone from his body. When the xenos turns to you, his hands are already empty — the stone is gone.{/n}

{n}D'un coup solennel, l'arlequin met un terme à la souffrance de l'Aeldari et s'empare délicatement de sa pierre-esprit. Lorsqu'il se tourne vers vous, ses mains sont déjà vides : la pierre a disparu.{/n}
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
"Nasıl hayır diyebilirim ki ricana,
Göz kulak olurum ruhunun nakaratına.
Ötesezen, sen bırak hakikati bana,
Şayan olduğun düşler ise kalsın sana."
{n}Arleken, vakur bir darbeyle zeno soydaşının çektiği eziyete son verip bedenindeki ruh taşını dikkatlice alıyor. Yüzünü sana döndüğünde, taşı bir yerlere kaldırmış bile... Elleri bomboş.{/n}
languages.original_text:
